body_html:
You change is not correct. V stores the singular vectors as stated. It is correct that A \approx U \Sigma V^H. Notice that this convention is unlike some other SVD libraries that return V^H.

The test that perhaps clarifies this best is here:
https://cs.corp.google.com/piper///depot/google3/third_party/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/svd_op_test.py?rcl=171836140&l=120

You change is not correct. V stores the singular vectors as stated. It is correct that A \approx U \Sigma V^H. Notice that this convention is unlike some other SVD libraries that return V^H.
The test that perhaps clarifies this best is here:
https://cs.corp.google.com/piper///depot/google3/third_party/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/svd_op_test.py?rcl=171836140&l=120
body:
You change is not correct. V stores the singular vectors as stated. It is correct that A \approx U \Sigma V^H. Notice that this convention is unlike some other SVD libraries that return V^H.

The test that perhaps clarifies this best is here:
https://cs.corp.google.com/piper///depot/google3/third_party/tensorflow/python/kernel_tests/svd_op_test.py?rcl=171836140&l=120
